title: No Grand Tour Sweep for UAE, but Plenty of Podium Time Even Without Pogačar: ‘We Didn’t Give Up’
content:
UAE's haul included three stage wins, the King of the Mountains jersey, the most combative rider prize, the team classification victory, and a top-10.

Read the full article at No Grand Tour Sweep for UAE, but Plenty of Podium Time Even Without Pogačar: ‘We Didn’t Give Up’ on Velo.
author: ahood
